trans-unit.source: Provides the underlying stream of data for network access.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o fluxo de dados subjacente para acesso à rede.

trans-unit.source: The NetworkStream class provides methods for sending and receiving data over <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType> sockets in blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: A classe de NetworkStream fornece métodos para enviar e receber dados através de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>sockets no modo de bloqueio.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about blocking versus nonblocking <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>s, see [Using an Asynchronous Client Socket](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a bloquear nonblocking <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>s, consulte [utilizando um Socket assíncrono do cliente](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can use the NetworkStream class for both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a classe de NetworkStream ambas as operações síncronas e assíncronas transferência de dados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about synchronous and asynchronous communication, see [Sockets](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a comunicação síncrona e assíncrona, consulte [Sockets](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a NetworkStream, you must provide a connected <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um NetworkStream, tem de fornecer um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> ligado

trans-unit.source: You can also specify what <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> permission the NetworkStream has over the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Também pode especificar que <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>tem permissão de NetworkStream através de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> fornecido</xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: By default, closing the NetworkStream does not close the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, a fechar o NetworkStream não feche o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> fornecido

trans-unit.source: If you want the NetworkStream to have permission to close the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you must specify `true` for the value of the `ownsSocket` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se quiser NetworkStream ter permissão para fechar fornecido <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, tem de especificar `true` para o valor do `ownsSocket` parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> methods for simple single thread synchronous blocking I/O.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>métodos para simple único thread e/s de bloqueio síncrona.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to process your I/O using separate threads, consider using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> methods, or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> methods for communication.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender processar a e/s separados threads a utilizar, considere utilizar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>métodos, ou o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>métodos de comunicação.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NetworkStream does not support random access to the network data stream.
trans-unit.target: O NetworkStream não suporta acesso aleatório para o fluxo de dados de rede.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A> property, which indicates whether the stream supports seeking, is always `false`; reading the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A> property, reading the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A> property, or calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A>propriedade, o que indica se o fluxo suporta a pesquisa, é sempre `false`; ao ler a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A>propriedade, ler a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A>propriedade, ou chamar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A>método irá gerar um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the NetworkStream class without the need for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Operações de leitura e escrita podem ser executadas em simultâneo numa instância da classe NetworkStream sem a necessidade de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required.
trans-unit.target: Desde que não há um único thread para as operações de escrita e um único thread para as operações de leitura, não existirá nenhum interferências entre leitura e escrita threads e sem sincronização é necessária.

trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> classe para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is created with read/write access to the specified <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>É criada com acesso de leitura/escrita para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> especificado</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `ownsSocket` parameter is `true`, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> takes ownership of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> method also closes the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> does not own the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, so calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> method does not close the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.

trans-unit.source: The `access` parameter sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: O `access` parâmetro define as <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>Propriedades de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> e</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, then the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se especificar <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, em seguida, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, then the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se especificar <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, em seguida, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, both method calls are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Se especificar <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, ambas as chamadas de método são permitidas.</xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> will use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>que o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> irá utilizar para enviar e receber dados.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma leitura assíncrona a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The BeginRead method starts asynchronously reading data from the incoming network buffers.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginRead inicia no modo assíncrono ler dados a partir das entrada das memórias intermédias de rede.

trans-unit.source: Calling the BeginRead method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método BeginRead dá-lhe a capacidade de receber dados dentro de um thread de execução separado.

trans-unit.source: You must create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the BeginRead method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de criar um método de chamada de retorno que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar e passar o respetivo nome para o método BeginRead.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Muito mínima, no seu `state` parâmetro tem de conter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Because you will want to obtain the received data within your callback method, you should create a small class or structure to hold a read buffer and any other useful information.
trans-unit.target: Porque, irá pretender obter os dados recebidos no seu método de chamada de retorno, deve criar uma classe de pequena ou a estrutura para conter uma memória intermédia de leitura e outras informações úteis.

trans-unit.source: Pass the structure or class instance to the BeginRead method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir a instância de estrutura ou classe para o método de BeginRead através de `state` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Deve chamar o método de chamada de retorno de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application calls BeginRead, the system will wait until data is received or an error occurs, and then the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> until the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> reads data or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando a aplicação chama BeginRead, o sistema aguardará recebidos dados ou ocorre um erro e, em seguida, o sistema irá utilizar o thread separado para executar o método de chamada de retorno especificado e blocos no <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>até fornecido <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>lê os dados ou emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the BeginRead method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender que o thread para bloquear depois de chamar o método BeginRead original, utilize o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>no método de chamada de retorno quando quiser continuar a executar o thread original.</xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações adicionais sobre como escrever métodos de chamada de retorno, consulte [um delegado como um método de chamada de retorno de empacotamento de referências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The BeginRead method reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginRead lê os dados que estiver disponível, até ao número de bytes especificada pelo `size` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se este foi causada por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Se assim for, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e os Sockets do Windows versão 2 erro código documentação da API no MSDN para uma descrição detalhada do erro, consulte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class without the need for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Ler e escrever operações podem ser executadas em simultâneo numa instância do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>classe sem a necessidade de sincronização.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required.
trans-unit.target: Desde que não há um único thread para as operações de escrita e um único thread para as operações de leitura, não existirá nenhum interferências entre leitura e escrita threads e sem sincronização é necessária.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that is the location in memory to store data read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Byte>que é a localização na memória para armazenar dados lidos no <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The location in `buffer` to begin storing the data.
trans-unit.target: A localização na `buffer` para começar a armazenar os dados.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes a ler a partir de <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegado que é executado quando BeginRead estiver concluída.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains any additional user-defined data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém quaisquer dados adicionais definidas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que representa a chamada assíncrona.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write to a stream.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma escrita assíncrona para uma transmissão em fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The BeginWrite method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginWrite inicia uma operação de envio assíncrono para o anfitrião remoto.

trans-unit.source: Calling the BeginWrite method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método BeginWrite dá-lhe a capacidade de enviar dados dentro de um thread de execução separado.

trans-unit.source: You must create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the BeginWrite method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de criar um método de chamada de retorno que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar e passar o respetivo nome para o método BeginWrite.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Muito mínima, no seu `state` parâmetro tem de conter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada de retorno tem de obter mais informações, pode criar uma classe de pequena ou a estrutura para conter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>e outras informações necessárias.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Pass the structure or class instance to the BeginWrite method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir a instância de estrutura ou classe para o método de BeginWrite através de `state` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should implement the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada de retorno deve implementar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application calls BeginWrite, the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando a aplicação chama BeginWrite, o sistema utiliza um thread separado para executar o método de chamada de retorno especificado e bloqueia no <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>até o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>envia o número de bytes pedido ou emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the BeginWrite method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender que o thread para bloquear depois de chamar o método BeginWrite original, utilize o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>no método de chamada de retorno quando quiser continuar a executar o thread original.</xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações adicionais sobre como escrever métodos de chamada de retorno, consulte [um delegado como um método de chamada de retorno de empacotamento de referências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Fecha o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> após uma espera de tempo especificado para permitir que os dados a serem enviados.

trans-unit.source: The Close method frees both unmanaged and managed resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: O método Fechar liberta os recursos de não geridos e geridos associados <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> owns the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, it is closed as well.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>proprietária subjacentes <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, está fechado, bem como.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> was associated with a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, the Close method will close the TCP connection, but not dispose of the associated <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>foi associado um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>o método Fechar irá fechar a ligação de TCP, mas não elimine o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> associados</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that specifies the number of milliseconds to wait to send any remaining data before closing.
trans-unit.target: Um 32 bits com sinal número inteiro que especifica o número de milissegundos a aguardar para enviar quaisquer dados restantes antes de fechar.

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: O timeout parâmetro é inferior a -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether data is available on the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> to be read.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os dados estão disponíveis no <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> a ser lido.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataAvailable property to determine if data is ready to be read.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade DataAvailable para determinar se os dados estão prontos a ser lido.

trans-unit.source: If DataAvailable is `true`, a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se for DataAvailable `true`, uma chamada para <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>devolve imediatamente.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, DataAvailable may throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Se o anfitrião remoto encerra ou fecha a ligação, DataAvailable pode acionar um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e os Sockets do Windows versão 2 erro código documentação da API no MSDN para uma descrição detalhada do erro, consulte.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>referências.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Handles the end of an asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: Processa o fim da leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndRead conclui a operação de leitura assíncrona foi iniciada no <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>, terá de criar um método de chamada de retorno que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>Delegar.</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Este método de chamada de retorno executa num thread separado e é chamado pelo sistema após <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>devolve.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada de retorno tem de aceitar o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>devolveu o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método como parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to obtain the state object passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dentro do método de chamada de retorno, chame o <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>para obter o objeto de estado transmitido para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extract the receiving <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> from this state object.
trans-unit.target: Extrair a receção <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>deste objeto de estado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, call the EndRead method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Depois de obter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, chame o método EndRead para concluir a operação de leitura e devolver o número de bytes lidos com êxito.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method blocks until data is available.
trans-unit.target: Os blocos de método EndRead, até que os dados estão disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method reads as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified in the `size` parameter of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndRead lê como a quantidade de dados que está disponível até ao número de bytes especificada no `size` parâmetro o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection and all available data has been received, the EndRead method completes immediately and returns zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Se o anfitrião remoto encerra o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>foi recebida ligação e todos os dados disponíveis, o método EndRead conclui imediatamente e devolve zero bytes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the received data, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult>, and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os dados recebidos, chame o <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>e extrair a memória intermédia contida no objeto de estado resultante.</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se este foi causada por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Se assim for, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e os Sockets do Windows versão 2 erro código documentação da API no MSDN para uma descrição detalhada do erro, consulte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handles the end of an asynchronous write.
trans-unit.target: Processa o fim de uma escrita assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: EndWrite completes the asynchronous send operation started in <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: EndWrite conclui a operação de envio assíncrono iniciada no <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>, terá de criar um método de chamada de retorno que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>Delegar.</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Este método de chamada de retorno executa num thread separado e é chamado pelo sistema após <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>devolve.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada de retorno tem de aceitar o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>devolveu o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>método como parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the `IAsyncResult` parameter to obtain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Dentro do método de chamada de retorno, chame o <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>propriedade o `IAsyncResult` parâmetro obter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, you can call the EndWrite method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: Depois de obter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, pode chamar o método EndWrite para concluir a operação de envio e devolver o número de bytes enviados com êxito.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The EndWrite method blocks until the requested number of bytes are sent.
trans-unit.target: Os blocos de método EndWrite até que o número pedido de bytes são enviados.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação não deve chamar este método; um objeto <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método é invocado automaticamente durante a recolha de lixo, a menos que Finalização pelo garbage collector foi desativada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the Finalize method, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como utilizar o método Finalize, consulte [finalizar métodos e os processos de destruição](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Flushes data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Esvaziamentos da dados da sequência.

trans-unit.source: This method is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Este método está reservado para utilização futura.

trans-unit.source: The Flush method implements the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method; however, because <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is not buffered, it has no affect on network streams.
trans-unit.target: O método de esvaziamento implementa o <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método; no entanto, porque <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>não é colocado na memória intermédia, não terá qualquer efeito em fluxos de rede.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling the Flush method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método de remoção não acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: Flushes data from the stream as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Esvaziamentos da dados da sequência como uma operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: Não irá impedir que esta operação.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object will complete after data has been flushed from the stream for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>objeto será concluída após tem foram descarregados dados da sequência para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>instância.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Um token de cancelamento utilizado para propagar a notificação que esta operação deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de tarefa que representa a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the data available on the stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento dos dados disponíveis no fluxo.

trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é atualmente suportada e sempre emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Reads data from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lê dados do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: Este método lê os dados para o `buffer` parâmetro e devolve o número de bytes lido com êxito.

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the Read method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se não estão disponíveis dados de leitura, o método de leitura devolve 0.

trans-unit.source: The Read operation reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura lê os dados que estiver disponível, até ao número de bytes especificada pelo `size` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the connection, and all available data has been received, the Read method completes immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Se o anfitrião remoto encerra a ligação e foi recebida todos os dados disponíveis, o método Read realiza imediatamente e devolver zero bytes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Check to see if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is readable by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Verifique se o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é legível ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to read from a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> that is not readable, you will get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar ler a partir de um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>que é não legível, obterá um <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se este foi causada por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Se assim for, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e os Sockets do Windows versão 2 erro código documentação da API no MSDN para uma descrição detalhada do erro, consulte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.target: - ou - size é superior ao comprimento do parâmetro buffer menos o valor da offset parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: You must derive from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class to use the Readable property.
trans-unit.target: Tem de derivar do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>classe para utilizar a propriedade legível.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If Readable is `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se for Readable `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is readable by checking the publicly accessible <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode determinar se um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é legível verificando acessível publicamente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The Readable property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade legível é definida quando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>está inicializado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> pode ser de leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time that a read operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de tempo que um blocos de operação de leitura à espera de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the read operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the read operation throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se a operação de leitura não for concluída no tempo especificado por esta propriedade, a operação de leitura, emitir uma <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property affects only synchronous reads performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade afeta apenas síncronas leituras realizadas por chamar a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect asynchronous reads performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não afeta assíncronas leituras realizadas por chamar a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that will elapse before a read operation fails.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>que especifica o período de tempo, em milissegundos, que irão decorrer antes de falha de uma operação de leitura.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, specifies that the read operation does not time out.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, especifica que a operação de leitura faz não o tempo limite.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than or equal to zero and is not <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor ou igual a zero e não é <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position of the stream to the given value.
trans-unit.target: Define a posição actual da transmissão em fluxo para o valor indicado.

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported and always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não é atualmente suportado e sempre emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é utilizado.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é utilizado.

trans-unit.source: The position in the stream.
trans-unit.target: A posição na sequência.

trans-unit.source: Any use of this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer utilização desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Define o comprimento da sequência.

trans-unit.source: This method always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Este método sempre emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é utilizado.

trans-unit.source: Any use of this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer utilização desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> subjacente

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> can use this property to get the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>pode utilizar esta propriedade para obter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> subjacente</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned from the Socket property if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> provides.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o subjacente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>devolveu a propriedade de Socket se necessitar de acesso para além disso que <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>fornece.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade é acessível apenas através de uma classe derivada ou esta classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that represents the underlying network connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>que representa a ligação de rede subjacente.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Writes data to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escreve dados para o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Write method starts at the specified `offset` and sends `size` bytes from the contents of `buffer` to the network.
trans-unit.target: O método de escrita inicia a determinada `offset` e envia `size` bytes o conteúdo de `buffer` à rede.

trans-unit.source: The Write method blocks until the requested number of bytes is sent or a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O método de escrita bloqueia até que o número de bytes pedido é enviado ou uma <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>é emitida.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Se receber um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e os Sockets do Windows versão 2 erro código documentação da API no MSDN para uma descrição detalhada do erro, consulte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Check to see if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is writable by accessing the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Verifique se o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é gravável acedendo a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to write to a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> that is not writable, you will get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar escrever a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>que é não gravável, obterá um <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Se receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se este foi causada por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that contains the data to write to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Byte>que contém os dados para escrever o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The location in `buffer` from which to start writing data.
trans-unit.target: A localização na `buffer` do qual pretende iniciar a escrita de dados.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes a escrever o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The buffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The buffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The offset parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O offset parâmetro é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The offset parameter is greater than the length of buffer.
trans-unit.target: - ou - offset é superior ao comprimento do parâmetro buffer .

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size parâmetro é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is greater than the length of buffer minus the value of the offset parameter.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size é superior ao comprimento do parâmetro buffer menos o valor da offset parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: There was a failure while writing to the network.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu uma falha ao escrever para a rede.

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: - ou - Ocorreu um erro ao aceder o socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a secção observações para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: -or- There was a failure reading from the network.
trans-unit.target: - ou - Ocorreu uma falha ao ler a partir da rede.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is writable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> é gravável.

trans-unit.source: You must derive from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class to use the Writeable property.
trans-unit.target: Tem de derivar do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>classe para utilizar a propriedade Writeable.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If Writeable is `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se for Writeable `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is writable by checking the publicly accessible <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode determinar se um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é gravável verificando acessível publicamente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The Writeable property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Writeable é definida quando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>está inicializado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be written to the stream; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados podem ser escritos no fluxo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time that a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de tempo que um blocos de operação de escrita à espera de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the write operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the write operation throws a <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se a operação de escrita não for concluída no tempo especificado por esta propriedade, a operação de escrita emite <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property affects only synchronous write operations performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade afeta as operações de escrita síncrona apenas efetuadas ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect asynchronous writes performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não afeta as escritas assíncronas efetuadas ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that will elapse before a write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>que especifica o período de tempo, em milissegundos, que irão decorrer antes de falha de uma operação de escrita.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, specifies that the write operation does not time out.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, especifica que a operação de escrita faz não o tempo limite.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than or equal to zero and is not <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor ou igual a zero e não é <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>
